name: Mappers' Guild Pack VII
description: A new set of vibrant challenges to overcome.
instructions: Play all of the Mappers' Guild VII pack, which require no difficulty reduction mods when submitting a score.

name: Mappers' Guild Pack VIII
description: Succeed with a chorus of voices.
instructions: Play all of the Mappers' Guild VIII pack, which require no difficulty reduction mods when submitting a score.

name: Mappers' Guild Pack IX
description: This is no subtle change.
instructions: Play all of the Mappers' Guild IX pack, which require no difficulty reduction mods when submitting a score.

name: MUZZ Pack
description: Break away from the endgame.

name: Ariabl'eyeS Pack

instructions: Play all of the Ariabl'eyes beatmap pack, which requires no difficulty reduction mods.

name: Camellia II
description: Exit the atmosphere.

name: Video Game Pack vol.1
description: A whole pack of video game goodness, done and dusted. Go you!

name: Video Game Pack vol.2
description: The sequel was no match for your skills, obviously.

name: Video Game Pack vol.3
description: True dedication to the gaming art.

name: Video Game Pack vol.4
description: You are Player 1.

name: Anime Pack vol.1
description: I-it's not like I'm proud of you or anything..

name: Anime Pack vol.2
description: Truly dedicated to 2D.

name: Anime Pack vol.3
description: You did it for the waifus.

name: Anime Pack vol.4
description: Has your ship not sailed?

name: Internet! Pack vol.1
description: Did somebody say something about IRC and ICQ?

name: Internet! Pack vol.2
description: Straight from an albino black sheep. Wait, what?

name: Internet! Pack vol.3
description: You didn't stumble upon this one, I'm guessing.

name: Internet! Pack vol.4
description: Must... have... more... memes...

name: Rhythm Game Pack vol.1
description: Many beats were clicked, but the rhythm isn't over yet.

name: Rhythm Game Pack vol.2
description: You just can't stop the beat.

name: Rhythm Game Pack vol.3
description: Everyone knows the classics play better on osu! anyway.

name: Rhythm Game Pack vol.4
description: A click away? More like, right here.

name: January 2018 Spotlight
description: Reality distorts.
instructions: Complete any gamemode version of the January Spotlights for 2018.

name: February 2018 Spotlight
description: Let's jump for dreams of future candy!
instructions: Complete any gamemode version of the February Spotlights for 2018.

name: March 2018 Spotlight
description: Transport me to Nirvana on the backs of angels!
instructions: Complete any gamemode version of the March Spotlights for 2018.

name: April 2018 Spotlight
description: A lesson from a DJ: drop kick captivatingly.
instructions: Complete any gamemode version of the April Spotlights for 2018.

name: 5,000 Plays
description: There's a lot more where that came from.

name: 15,000 Plays
description: Must.. click.. circles..

name: 25,000 Plays
description: There's no going back.

name: 50,000 Plays
description: You're here forever.

name: Catch 20,000 fruits
description: That is a lot of dietary fiber.

name: Catch 200,000 fruits
description: So, I heard you like fruit...

name: Catch 2,000,000 fruits
description: Downright healthy.

name: Catch 20,000,000 fruits
description: Nothing left behind.

name: 30,000 Drum Hits
description: Did that drum have a face?

name: 300,000 Drum Hits
description: The rhythm never stops.

name: 3,000,000 Drum Hits
description: Truly, the Don of dons.

name: 30,000,000 Drum Hits
description: Your rhythm, eternal.

name: 40,000 Keys
description: Just the start of the rainbow.

name: 400,000 Keys
description: Four hundred thousand and still not even close.

name: 4,000,000 Keys
description: Is this the end of the rainbow?

name: 40,000,000 Keys
description: When someone asks which keys you play, the answer is now 'yes'.

name: Don't let the bunny distract you!
description: The order was indeed, not a rabbit.

name: S-Ranker
description: Accuracy is really underrated.

name: Most Improved
description: Now THAT is improvement.

name: Non-stop Dancer
description: Can you still feel your feet after that?

name: Consolation Prize
description: Well, it could be worse.

name: Challenge Accepted
description: Oh, you're ON.

name: Stumbler
description: No regrets.

name: Jackpot
description: Lucky sevens is a mild understatement.

name: Quick Draw
description: It's high noon.

name: Obsessed
description: COMPLETION AT ALL COSTS.

name: Nonstop
description: Breaks? What are those?

name: Jack of All Trades
description: Good at everything.

name: Twin Perspectives
description: You met Mani and Mari, our twin osu!mania mascots.

name: Perseverance
description: Endure.
instructions: Endurance is the key.

name: Feel The Burn
description: It isn't all about how fast you manage.
instructions: Endurance and precision is essential.

name: Time Dilation
description: Longer is shorter when all is said and done.
instructions: Time often flies when one is having fun, though rarely does it last forever.

name: Just One Second
description: And suddenly.. gone.
instructions: Blink and you'll miss it.

name: Afterimage
description: But a glimpse of its true self.
instructions: Always coming behind the original image.

name: To The Core
description: In for a penny, in for a pound. Pounding bass, that is.
instructions: Double negatives sometimes do make a positive.

name: Prepared
description: Do it for real next time.
instructions: Preparation is key for all successful endeavours.

name: Eclipse
description: Something new born from absence.
instructions: Do it just because you can, even if the stakes are high.

name: Reckless Abandon
description: Throw it all to the wind.
instructions: Do it just because you can, even if the stakes are high.

name: Tunnel Vision
description: But it was right there..
instructions: Afraid of the dark?

name: Behold No Deception
description: That wasn't easy at all!
instructions: Sometimes the hard way is in fact, easier.

name: Up For The Challenge
description: Turn it up to eleven.
instructions: Everything's better at eleven.

name: Lights Out
description: The party's just getting started.
instructions: Set the mood.

name: Unstoppable
description: Holy shit.
instructions: Reaching the limits of mortal skill.

name: Is This Real Life?
description: You did NOT just pull that off.
instructions: The absolute height of perfection.

name: Camera Shy
description: Stop being cute.
instructions: Uguu.

name: The Sum Of All Fears
description: Unfortunate.
instructions: The end comes when you least expect it.

name: Dekasight
description: So big, yet so hard to see.
instructions: Size isn't everything.

name: Hour Before The Dawn
description: Eleven skies of everlasting sunrise.
instructions: The night where we belong.

name: Slow And Steady
description: Win the race, or start again.
instructions: Take your time.

name: No Time To Spare
description: Places to be, things to do.
instructions: Think fast, click fast, be fast.

name: Sognare
description: A dream in stop-motion, soon forever gone.
instructions: "I saw three spires all around, and a world in halted time.."

name: Realtor Extraordinaire
description: An acre-wide stride.
instructions: The wrong kind of house.

name: Realität
description: A moonlight butterfly, and beacons of three.
instructions: Dream of greater heights.

name: Our Mechanical Benefactors
description: Human, please explain directive "GREED".
instructions: Close, yet so far.

name: Meticulous
description: The circle goes here, and then here, and then here..
instructions: This is the way it's SUPPOSED to be.

name: Infinitesimal
description: Big word for something so very, very small.
instructions: Tiny in scope, big in meaning.

name: Equilibrium
description: Balance in all things.
instructions: Seek the middle ground.

name: Impeccable
description: Speed matters not to the exemplary.
instructions: Simply superb.

name: Elite
description: Dangerous beat agents.
instructions: A challenge for status, prestige and fame is not always the smartest thing to do in the middle of something.

description: Half full or half empty, that's a whole lot of fifty.
instructions: Strong opinions about this, one way or another.

name: Thrill of the Chase
description: My heart's beating, my hands are shaking, and I'm STILL clicking.
instructions: Is there anything better than the hunt? Such a classic pursuit.

name: The Girl in the Forest
description: Not even the Elite Four could stop you now.
instructions: Think back to where it all began, in shades of red and blue..

name: You Can't Hide
description: I will find you, and I will click you. All of you.
instructions: Don't even try to hide.

name: True Torment
description: It lasts forever.
instructions: Note the ghosts.

name: The Firmament Moves
description: Number fourteen? More like number one.
instructions: Three times does it move, but most only know one. What you seek is something different yet again, warped three times over.

name: Too Fast, Too Furious
description: A march if you have eight feet, maybe!
instructions: Something you don't do when you're afraid.

name: Feelin' It
description: Got with the times.
instructions: Beats multiplied. A lot of them.

name: Overconfident
description: Try again later, maybe?
instructions: The 's' in progress stands for hubris.

name: Spooked
description: Something moved. It wasn't your cursor!
instructions: Don't look behind you.

name: Skylord
description: Never miss a wingbeat.
instructions: Flight among the sky requires nothing but perfection.

name: B-Rave
description: It takes courage to stand before the master.
instructions: Ill-tempered bosses make for excellent final battles.

name: Any%
description: A speedrunner's best friend.
instructions: Sometimes you have to break the rules to work with speed.

name: Mirage
description: The horizon goes on forever, and ever, and ever...
instructions: The light is far harder than it seems.

name: Under The Stars
description: Onwards, to where the darkness can never stop us.
instructions: Walk beneath the stars on a journey to elsewhere.

name: Senseless
description: I hear nothing. I see nothing.
instructions: A song that is, and something that is not.

name: Aeon
description: In the mire of thawing time, memory shall be your guide.
instructions: When time runs slow and sight fails you, how will you succeed?

name: Upon The Wind
description: And in that gale, no eye could hope to follow.
instructions: In the heart of a storm of flowers, a world unseen.

name: Vantage
description: There we stood, where the spires pierced the sky, and dreamed of the future to come.
instructions: Where ground was broken to critical acclaim.

name: Quick Maths
description: Beats per minute over... this isn't quick at all!
instructions: Where x equals beats per minute, and a variable unknown...

name: Efflorescence
description: A lament for the past, and a glimpse into tomorrow.
instructions: The horizon thunders with a portentous bloom.

name: Inundate
description: Swept away.
instructions: Across and beyond the tides.

name: Not Bluffing
description: Did that with my eyes closed.
instructions: It's not arrogance if you can live up to it.

name: Eureka!
description: By Jove, you've got it!
instructions: When inspiration strikes...

name: Regicide
description: A king no more.
instructions: No throne lasts forever.

name: Permadeath
description: One life, one shot.
instructions: Better make it count! Ware well the example of the white cat.

name: The Future Is Now
description: The stars showed you all that was to come.
instructions: Withstand the primordial.

name: Natural 20
description: Rolled it.
instructions: Not just a chance of the dice, this one is all skill.

name: Kaleidoscope
description: So many pretty colours. Most of them red.
instructions: See the tiny colours up through the tube up close and personal, and slow right down.

name: AHAHAHAHA
description: TOGETHER FOREVER.
instructions: Who am I? Where am I? What the hell IS this place?

name: Valediction
description: One last time.
instructions: Time stood still as we waved farewell.

name: Ten To One
description: From one extreme to another.
instructions: From a marathon to a sprint.

name: Exquisite
description: Indubitably.
instructions: Do it once with true calibre, then do it again.

name: Persistence Is Key
description: Don't let your dreams be dreams.
instructions: Don't give up!

name: Mad Scientist
description: The experiment... it's all gone!
instructions: Become invisible.

name: Tribulation
description: Success is inevitable... eventually.
instructions: Struggle and then stop.

name: Right On Time
description: The first minute is always the hardest.
instructions: Every hour's got sixty, but your timer only wants one.

name: Replica
description: One just like the other.
instructions: Duplicate.

name: All Good
description: Better now, thanks!
instructions: You got this.

name: Dead Center
description: As all things should be.
instructions: Perfect balance.

name: In Memoriam
description: In loving memory of your sanity, long forgotten.
instructions: Conquer a test of the most frustrating combination of mods imaginable.

name: Sanguine
description: Timeless thorns still draw blood.
instructions: Return to the past, when everything was simpler.

name: Not Again
description: Regret everything.
instructions: You had it all, and then it was gone.

name: Final Boss
description: Game over.
instructions: Let the credits roll.

name: Beast Mode
description: Unleash the animal within!
instructions: Go absolutely feral.

name: Deliberation
description: The challenge remains.
instructions: Turn a short challenge into a long one.

name: Lightless
description: Better the devil you know.
instructions: I CAN'T SEE A THING.

name: When You See It
description: Three numbers which will haunt you forevermore.
instructions: You don't need a hint for this one.

name: Mortal Coils
description: Never one without the other.
instructions: Prisoners of flesh in an unending apocalypse.

name: Dark Familiarity
description: No mistakes, no witnesses.
instructions: Don't second guess yourself.

name: Creator's Gambit
description: I made this.
instructions: Make your own prize.

name: Finality
description: High stakes, no regrets.
instructions: completing a map with the Sudden Death mod enabled!

name: Perfectionist
description: Accept nothing but the best.
instructions: completing a map with the Perfect mod enabled!

name: Rock Around The Clock
description: You can't stop the rock.
instructions: completing a map with the Hard Rock mod enabled!

name: Time And A Half
description: Having a right ol' time. One and a half of them, almost.
instructions: completing a map with the DoubleTime mod enabled!

name: Sweet Rave Party
description: Founded in the fine tradition of changing things that were just fine as they were.
instructions: completing a map with the Nightcore mod enabled!

name: Blindsight
description: I can see just perfectly.
instructions: completing a map with the Hidden mod enabled!

name: Are You Afraid Of The Dark?
description: Harder than it looks, probably because it's hard to look.
instructions: completing a map with the Flashlight mod enabled!

name: Dial It Right Back
description: Sometimes you just want to take it easy.
instructions: completing a map with the Easy mod enabled!

name: Risk Averse
description: Safety nets are fun!
instructions: completing a map with the No Fail mod enabled!

name: Slowboat
description: You got there. Eventually.
instructions: completing a map with the HalfTime mod enabled!

name: Burned Out
description: One cannot always spin to win.
instructions: completing a map with the Spun Out mod enabled!

name: Summer 2018 Beatmap Spotlights
description: The hottest beatmaps from Summer 2018!
instructions: Play all of the maps from one mode of the Summer 2018 Beatmap Spotlights.

name: Fall 2018 Beatmap Spotlights
description: The most fabulous beatmaps from Fall 2018!
instructions: Play all of the maps from one mode of the Fall 2018 Beatmap Spotlights.

name: Winter 2019 Beatmap Spotlights
description: The chillest beatmaps from Winter 2019!
instructions: Play all of the maps from one mode of the Winter 2019 Beatmap Spotlights.

name: Spring 2019 Beatmap Spotlights
description: A bloomin' good time from Spring 2019!
instructions: Play all of the maps from one mode of the Spring 2019 Beatmap Spotlights.

name: Summer 2019 Beatmap Spotlights
description: Blaze a trail through the best of Summer 2019!
instructions: Play all of the maps from one mode of the Summer 2019 Beatmap Spotlights.

name: Autumn 2019 Beatmap Spotlights
description: Fall straight into the best maps of Autumn 2019!
instructions: Play all of the maps from one mode of the Autumn 2019 Beatmap Spotlights.

name: Winter 2020 Beatmap Spotlights
description: The best of Winter 2020 in beatmap form!
instructions: Play all of the maps from one mode of the Winter 2020 Beatmap Spotlights.

name: 500 Combo
description: 500 big ones! You're moving up in the world!
instructions: aiming for a combo of 500 or higher on any beatmap

name: 750 Combo
description: 750 notes back to back? Woah.
instructions: aiming for a combo of 750 or higher on any beatmap

name: 1,000 Combo
description: A thousand reasons why you rock at this game.
instructions: aiming for a combo of at least 1,000 on any beatmap (try a marathon)

name: 2,000 Combo
description: Nothing can stop you now.
instructions: aiming for a combo of at least 2,000 on any beatmap (try a marathon)

name: I can see the top
description: Your dedication has paid off. Welcome to the top 50,000!

name: The gradual rise
description: There's no stopping you, is there? Welcome to the top 10,000!

name: Scaling up
description: Welcome to the top 5,000. Never give up!

name: Approaching the summit
description: Pro tier. Welcome to the top 1,000!

name: Rising Star
description: Can't go forward without the first steps.

name: Constellation Prize
description: Definitely not a consolation prize. Now things start getting hard!

name: Building Confidence
description: Oh, you've SO got this.

name: Insanity Approaches
description: You're not twitching, you're just ready.

name: These Clarion Skies
description: Everything seems so clear now.

name: Above and Beyond
description: A cut above the rest.

name: Supremacy
description: All marvel before your prowess.

name: Absolution
description: My god, you're full of stars!

name: Event Horizon
description: No force dares to pull you under.
instructions: Stare into the abyss, and pass the trial of any 9 star map.

name: Phantasm
description: Fevered is your passion, extraordinary is your skill.
instructions: Approach the limit of human endurance, and pass a 10 star map.

name: Totality
description: All the notes. Every single one.

name: Business As Usual
description: Two to go, please.

name: Building Steam
description: Hey, this isn't so bad.

name: Moving Forward
description: Bet you feel good about that.

name: Paradigm Shift
description: Surprisingly difficult.

name: Anguish Quelled
description: Don't choke.

name: Never Give Up
description: Excellence is its own reward.

name: Aberration
description: They said it couldn't be done. They were wrong.

name: Chosen
description: Reign among the Prometheans, where you belong.
instructions: Triumph over one of the hardest beatmaps ever made, and FC a 9 star map.

name: Unfathomable
description: You have no equal.
instructions: Cement your place among legends, and FC any 10 star map.

name: My First Don
description: Marching to the beat of your own drum. Literally.

name: Katsu Katsu Katsu
description: Hora! Ikuzo!

name: Not Even Trying
description: Muzukashii? Not even.

name: Face Your Demons
description: The first trials are now behind you, but are you a match for the Oni?

name: The Demon Within
description: No rest for the wicked.

name: Drumbreaker
description: Too strong.

name: The Godfather
description: You are the Don of Dons.

name: Rhythm Incarnate
description: Feel the beat. Become the beat.

name: Keeping Time
description: Don, then katsu. Don, then katsu..

name: To Your Own Beat
description: Straight and steady.

name: Big Drums
description: Bigger scores to match.

name: Adversity Overcome
description: Difficult? Not for you.

name: Demonslayer
description: An Oni felled forevermore.

name: Rhythm's Call
description: Heralding true skill.

name: Time Everlasting
description: Not a single beat escapes you.

name: The Drummer's Throne
description: Percussive brilliance befitting royalty alone.

name: A Slice Of Life
description: Hey, this fruit catching business isn't bad.

name: Dashing Ever Forward
description: Fast is how you do it.

name: Zesty Disposition
description: No scurvy for you, not with that much fruit.

name: Hyperdash ON!
description: Time and distance is no obstacle to you.

name: It's Raining Fruit
description: And you can catch them all.

name: Fruit Ninja
description: Legendary techniques.

name: Dreamcatcher
description: No fruit, only dreams now.

name: Lord of the Catch
description: Your kingdom kneels before you.

name: Sweet And Sour
description: Apples and oranges, literally.

name: Reaching The Core
description: The seeds of future success.

name: Clean Platter
description: Clean only of failure. It is completely full, otherwise.

name: Between The Rain
description: No umbrella needed.

name: Addicted
description: That was an overdose?

name: Quickening
description: A dash above normal limits.

name: Supersonic
description: Faster than is reasonably necessary.

name: Dashing Scarlet
description: Speed beyond mortal reckoning.

name: First Steps
description: It isn't 9-to-5, but 1-to-9. Keys, that is.

name: No Normal Player
description: Not anymore, at least.

name: Impulse Drive
description: Not quite hyperspeed, but getting close.

name: Hyperspeed
description: Woah.

name: Ever Onwards
description: Another challenge is just around the corner.

name: Another Surpassed
description: Is there no limit to your skills?

name: Extra Credit
description: See me after class.

name: Maniac
description: There's just no stopping you.

name: Keystruck
description: The beginning of a new story.

name: Keying In
description: Finding your groove.

name: Hyperflow
description: You can *feel* the rhythm.

name: Breakthrough
description: Many skills mastered, rolled into one.

name: Everything Extra
description: Giving your all is giving everything you have.

name: Level Breaker
description: Finesse beyond reason.

name: Step Up
description: A precipice rarely seen.

name: Behind The Veil
description: Supernatural!
